Package local.intranet.tombola.api.controller

Class StatusController

java.lang.Object
local.intranet.tombola.api.controller.StatusController
@RestController @RequestMapping("${spring.data.rest.basePath:/api}/v1/info") public class StatusController extends Object
StatusController for TombolaApplication It's for charge of system information

    • getPlainStatus

      @GetMapping(value="/status", produces="text/plain") @PreAuthorize("hasRole(\'ROLE_userRole\')") public String getPlainStatus()
      text/plain: "OK"

      Accessible to the RoleType.USER_ROLE

      Returns:
      "OK" if Tombola API is running
      See Also:
      • tombola/swagger-ui/#/status-controller/getPlainStatus

    • getTombolaEnvironment

      @GetMapping(value="/getEnvironment", produces="application/json") @PreAuthorize("hasRole(\'ROLE_adminRole\')") public List<Map.Entry<String,String>> getTombolaEnvironment()
      Info of Tomcat Environment.

      Accessible to the RoleType.ADMIN_ROLE

      Returns:
      List<Map.Entry<String,String>> ((ConfigurableEnvironment) environment).getSystemEnvironment() sorted System.getenv() with Map.Entry<String, String> for ${k.key} and ${k.value} in properties.html. Sort by ${k.key} String.CASE_INSENSITIVE_ORDER
      See Also:
      • tombola/swagger-ui/#/status-controller/getTombolaEnvironment
